slidelink.displaytext: General Security Features in Paper Documents

search.slidetext: if you want help understanding how to navigate this training player, click on each glowing item in this image of the training player to understand how it works. click the next button in the training player to continue. menu click this item to show or hide the table of contents menu module title this is the name of your current training module next button click this button to advance to the next slide. some slides will not allow you to proceed until all required actions are complete. previous button click this button to return to the previous slide.

review examples of common security features on a colorado title identify titles and manufacturer’s statementof origin (mso’s) explore secure forms by the end of this training, you will be able to: learning outcomes

titles, mso’s and colorado title history common security features - colorado title common security features - colorado title common security features - colorado title secure forms main menu explore the different topics below. click on an icon to learn more.

manufacturer’s statement of origin (mso’s) and title what is a title? what is an mso? a generated document by the manufacturer that is considered the “birth certificate” of a vehicle. a legal, transferable, document showing proof of ownership to a vehicle.
mso mso mso click on the buttons to review. explore: mso and title title title title
colorado title history timeline 1988 to present signature of seller(s) only! 1988 1988 lienholder(s) information vin, year, make & model owner odometer

2010 -2017 2010 -2017 2010 -2017 2006-2010 2006-2010 2006-2010 2005 - 2006 2005 - 2006 2005 - 2006 1993 -2005 1993 -2005 1993 -2005 1991 - 1992 1991 - 1992 1991 - 1992 1990 1990 1990 1989 1989 1989 colorado title history timeline 1989 to present click on each date range to review the content. 2005 2005 2005 click the to return back to this timeline. 2017- present 2017- present 2017- present

authentic forms are used at dmv for important transactions such as title and registration secure forms - why titles a ownership document bill of salea certificate of transfer of personal property power of attorney a legal document that appoints authority

other illegal activities identity fraud fraudulent or counterfeit documents about secure forms a secure form can be a paper document that includes security features to prove a document's authenticity. these security features help us to identify:

security features in a colorado title security features on a colorado title take a moment to review the security features of a title. click on each box. once you are done reviewing, click the to close the box. security features – colorado title developer: this slide contains default logic code.

click on each number to explore general security features in paper documents. general security features in paper documents 1 1 1 1 hidden pantograph [tech note: image size for 50/50 layout is 640w x 721h.] 2 2 2 2 watermark/hologram 3 3 3 3 erasure protection/safety block 4 4 4 4 rainbow prismatic printing click the to return back to this menu.

you now have a better understanding of: titles and mso colorado title history secure papers and security features security features specifically for a vehicle title additional resources: vehicle services manual congratulations on completing the titles, mso and secure forms training
